name: Death's Son
description:
#TPS Official Game Jam #5

You are the Grim Reaper's son. He expects you to be a fine soul reaper.
As such he teaches you how to be the new death god.

But you are too young and he gives you a small fraction of the reaper power. Your purpose in the game is to collect souls by killing living people.
Don't worry, in the medieval age, people died often from almost everything so there is no need to pity them.

Will you be able to satisfy your father? or will you continue to be a giant small disappointment to him?

Controls:

You move with 'A' and 'D'.
You jump with Space
You attack with Left Click and dash with Right Click
And finally, you enter berserk mode with Q. 

In berserk mode, you are immortal, as long as you have death power.
This mode does not last too long and you regenerate all your help on casting.
